price: Sesungguhnya (agama tauhid) ini adalah agama kamu semua, agama yang satu 1007, dan Aku adalah Tuhan-mu, maka bertakwalah kepada-Ku.
arabic: وَإِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦٓ أُمَّتُكُمۡ أُمَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ وَأَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمۡ فَٱتَّقُونِ
footnotes: 1007.  Lihat Catatan Kaki Surah Al-Anbiyā` (21) ayat 92.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna hādhihi ummatukum ummatan wāḥidatan wa-anā rabbukum fa-ittaqūni
